Tucson had been resting a while since his battle injury and the thrill of t=
he first fight does not daunt his desire to go back out there and do it all=
 over again.  

"I - really hate to miss out - on the fun.  Perhaps in a fe=
w hours I'll be ready to take on another challenge.  But - for now.. Yeah..=
. I - could use a few hours of down time I suppose."  

He smiles, pats Tal=
on on the shoulder and lies back to try and repair his systems by giving th=
em a rest.

Tucson could feel that she too was a bit like himself.  Unsure of things, w=
ondering if these expressions of feelings were real, instead of just some c=
heap side effect from an infusion of venom.  At first he too, is lost for w=
ords, as shyness creeps in somewhat.  Yet his expression remains the same, =
with a smile on his face.  He didn't believe in showing off as other bots m=
ay have done to impress a femme bot.  He believed in being sincere, and him=
self.
> 
>   " Thanks for - being right there with me Talon.  You - were a =
big help."
> 
>   It wasn't much but he knew he made one small step to buil=
ding a relationship.
